name: compressive
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
resulting from or caused by pressure, or by pressing something into a smaller space: The posts should hold the concrete in place when it is subjected to a compressive force. The compressive strain caused the two sides to be crushed together.
medical
  specialized A compressive injury is caused by pressure on part of a person's body: The patient had a compressive joint injury. A scan revealed that there was a compressive lesion of the spinal cord.
medical
  specialized reducing pain or swelling by pressing against a part of a person's body: She applied a compressive dressing to stabilize the wound. The doctor recommended that I should wear a compressive joint support.
More examplesFewer examplesThe prosecution alleged that the defendant placed excessive compressive force on the victim's chest.They placed a compressive device on the patient's leg. The compressive dressing will push the skin down against the muscle.
